A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Eye candy with little to no depth. Plot consists of a string of non-sequiturs thrown together obviously designed by committee for the sake of merchandise and video games. Writers attempt to distract audience from noticing plot holes with overly adorable CG critters. It's a tired recipe that works in other movies of its kind (new star treks and guardians of the galaxy come to mind). Character depth is non-existent with little to no motive behind their decisions.
